definitions.body: rulers, judges, either as divine representatives at sacred places or as reflecting divine majesty and power: [[האלהים]] Ex 21:6 (Onk SyrVer, but to\ krith/rion tou= Qeou= LXX) Ex 22:7, Ex 22:8; [[אלהים]] Ex 22:8, Ex 22:27 (Targum Ra AE Ew RVm; but gods, LXX Josephus Philo AV; God, DiRV; all Covt. code of E) cf. 1Sa 2:25 v. definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: divine ones, superhuman beings including God and angels Ps 8:6 (De Che Br; but angels LXX SyrVer Targum Ew; God, RV and most moderns) Ge 1:27 (if with Philo Targum Jer De Che we interpret [[נעשה]] as God's consultation with angels; cf. Job 38:7). †

definitions.body: angels Ps 97:7 (LXX SyrVer Calv; but gods, Hup De Pe Che); cf. definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: god or goddess, always with sf. 1Sa 5:7 (Dagon), Ju Jdg 11:24 (Chemosh), 1Ki 18:24 (Baal), Ju Jdg 9:27, Da 1:2, Da 1:2; or cstr. definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: godlike one Ex 4:16 (J; Moses in relation to Aaron), Ex 7:1 (P; in relation to Pharaoh), 1Sa 28:13 (the shade of Samuel), Ps 45:7 (the Messianic king, O God, LXX SyrVer Jer, most scholars ancient and modern, but thy throne is God's = God's throne AE Ki Thea Ew Hup, cf. 1Ch 28:5).
